alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Louisa, northeastern Cumberland, Goochland, northwestern Powhatan and Fluvanna Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1130 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Monticello to near Columbia to Ballsville. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Powhatan, Goochland, Hadensville, Palmyra, Cartersville, Fork Union, Lake Monticello, Columbia, Gum Spring, Oilville, Ferncliff, Tobaccoville, Trenholm, Lakeside Village, Macon, Kents Store, Troy, Fife, Sunnyside and Boswells Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in Ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and Minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid Hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Louisa
